TopicTitle: Is possible to lover in-game music and increase voice on video.

Articles.Content:
In short, let's play recorded of certain a game, and that comes from playing music is louder than my voice :-(

Is it possible to amplify the volume of my voice in an already finished recording, I used "ShadowpPlay"

> 
> In short, let's play recorded of certain a game, and that comes from playing music is louder than my voice :-(
> Is it possible to amplify the volume of my voice in an already finished recording, I used "ShadowpPlay"

In Audacity you can... Don't know about "Shadowplay" though...

Pick out your voice's audio, and raise it.

> 
> In Audacity you can... Don't know about "Shadowplay" though...
> Pick out your voice's audio, and raise it.

does audacity can edit video, and does it can detect my voice?

> 
> does audacity can edit video, and does it can detect my voice?

Audacity is only audio...

Maybe you need multiple programs, I don't know. I'm not much of a computer guy.
